      • handle

        public final void handle​(ExchangePacket packet)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: RequestHandler
        Handles the given request and generates a response; returns code 500 error if no response is sent. Information from the client is provided in an ExchangePacket. Exceptions thrown are suppressed by the handler and will not throw a response.
        Specified by:
        handle in class RequestHandler
        Parameters:
        packet - a packet of data containing client information
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - internal failure
        java.lang.Exception - any exceptions thrown within the handler
        See Also:
        ExchangePacket

      • handle

        public void handle​(ExchangePacket packet,
                   java.io.File source)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles the given request and generates a response unless the file was not found.
        Parameters:
        packet - a packet of data containing client information
        source - the file requested by the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - internal failure
        java.lang.Exception - any exceptions thrown within the handler
        Since:
        01.01.01
